meta.article_title: December 3, 2012 - The Backhand Loop and Hit One-Two Punch

debutant.description: Commit to backhand loop and hit any deep ball with backspin, and follow-up block or topspin return.

exercices_complementaires.description: Loop any deep ball with backspin, then follow up with a backhand hit against the blocked or topspin return.

metriques_progression.target: Last-second changes in placement with a backhand hit
metriques_progression.reps: Vary the placement of your opening backhand loop

erreurs_a_eviter.description: Don't forget to open against backspin on the backhand side
